Effect Text: Send one of your units on the field to the\rgraveyard, return one of your units to your hand.\rYou can play this card after you've passed.
Attach to a unit on the field. Its strength is halved\rthis round. This unit remains on the field to fight\rin the next round at full strength.
Replace this card with any unit on either side of\rthe field, and add that card to your hand.
Replace this card with any of your units on the\rfield, and add that card to your hand.
Replace this card with any of your opponent's\runits on the field, and add that card to your\rhand.
If you have three units in the same row, replace\rthem with this card. Two return to your hand,\rsend one to the graveyard.
Double the strength of a row.\rChoose two units to return to the opponent's\rhand until the next round.
Double the strength of a row.\rClear all weather effects, and draw a card.
Double the strength of a row.\rThe Siege row fights at half strength this round.\rSend a unit to the graveyard.
Double the strength of a row.\rSwap one unit on the field with your opponent\rfor every King on the field.
Double the strength of a row.\rThe Melee row fights at half strength this round.\rSend a unit to the graveyard.
If drawn from the graveyard,\rdraw another unit from the graveyard.
Reveal a power card in your opponent's hand.
Double the strength of your opponent's strongest\rrow. In the next round this card switches sides.
Send all of the strongest units on both sides of\rthe Melee row to the graveyard.
Choose one unit in the opponent's field to send\rto the graveyard.
Choose one unit in the opponent's field to send\rto the graveyard.
If a King is on the field, set it aside until the start\rof the next round.
Reveal two power cards in your opponent's hand.\rDraw a unit card.
Send your King to the graveyard.\rIf your King was on the field, draw three units;\rif it was in your hand, draw four.
The strongest units from each player's hand are\rsent to the graveyard.
Return the last card you played to your hand.
Attach to a unit; this unit now has plus two base\rstrength.
Attach to a unit; this unit now has plus two base\rstrength.
Reveal the top unit in the graveyard and add it to\ryour hand. If it has less than three strength draw\ranother card.
Send one of your units on the field to the\rgraveyard. If its strength was less than four, draw\rtwo cards; otherwise, draw three.
Set a unit's base strength to one.
If your King is on the field, return it to your hand.\rThe top card in the graveyard is played on your\rside of the field.
Move a unit to any row.
Choose one unit from the graveyard and play it\ron your side of the field.
Discard up to three cards from your hand.\rAdd three times the number of discarded cards\rto the base strength of a unit.
Pick a card from the top three in the power\rgraveyard, and add that card to your hand.
Set aside one of your units on the field until the\rstart of the next round. Draw two cards at the\rend of this round.
The round ends after your next turn.
Send a card from your hand to the graveyard.\rYour opponent then discards the strongest unit\rin their hand.
Send one of your units on the field and two of\ryour opponent's to the graveyard.
Add one base strength to two adjacent units\rin this row.
Add one base strength to two adjacent units in\rthis row.
Play in any of the opponent's rows and draw two\rcards. If the row has no other cards at the end of\rthe round, send any unit to the graveyard.
Play in the opponent's Siege row, then draw two\rcards.
Play in the opponents ranged row, then draw\rtwo cards.
Draw two cards, your opponent draws one.
Play in the opponents Melee row, then draw\rtwo cards.

Remove all weather effects.
